sqlMap.delete:
/*srvcrIdnfItmValDtls.deleteSrvcrIdnfItmValDtls*/ delete from srvcr_idnf_itm_val_dtls where srvcr_id = #srvcrId#
and idnf_itm_val1 = #idnfItmVal1#
and idnf_itm_val2 = #idnfItmVal2#
and idnf_itm_val3 = #idnfItmVal3#
and idnf_itm_val4 = #idnfItmVal4#
and idnf_itm_val5 = #idnfItmVal5#
and idnf_itm_val6 = #idnfItmVal6#
and idnf_itm_val7 = #idnfItmVal7#
and idnf_itm_val8 = #idnfItmVal8#
and idnf_itm_val9 = #idnfItmVal9#
and idnf_itm_val10 = #idnfItmVal10#
sqlMap.insert:
/*srvcrIdnfItmValDtls.insertSrvcrIdnfItmValDtls*/ insert into srvcr_idnf_itm_val_dtls ( srvcr_id, idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn, idnf_itm_val1, idnf_itm_val2, idnf_itm_val3, idnf_itm_val4, idnf_itm_val5, idnf_itm_val6, idnf_itm_val7, idnf_itm_val8, idnf_itm_val9, idnf_itm_val10, vld_bgng_dt, vld_end_dt, del_yn, frst_crt_usrid, frst_crt_ptm, frst_crt_pgm_id, last_chg_usrid, last_chg_ptm, last_chg_pgm_id )values
( #[].srvcrId#, #[].idnfItmValDtlsSn# , #[].idnfItmVal1#, #[].idnfItmVal2#, #[].idnfItmVal3#, #[].idnfItmVal4#, #[].idnfItmVal5#, #[].idnfItmVal6#, #[].idnfItmVal7#, #[].idnfItmVal8#, #[].idnfItmVal9#, #[].idnfItmVal10#, #[].vldBgngDt#, #[].vldEndDt#, 'N', '관리자', now(), '관리자', '관리자', now(), '관리자' )
sqlMap.update: /*srvcrIdnfItmValDtls.updateSrvcrIdnfItmValDtls*/ update srvcr_idnf_itm_val_dtls set vld_end_dt = #vldEndDt# , del_yn = #delYn# , last_chg_usrid = '관리자' , last_chg_ptm = now() , last_chg_pgm_id = '관리자' where srvcr_id = #srvcrId# and idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn = #idnfItmValDtlsSn#
sqlMap.select:
/*srvcrIdnfItmValDtls.selectSrvcrDtls*/ select a.srvcr_id , a.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn , a.idnf_itm_val1 , a.idnf_itm_val2 , a.idnf_itm_val3 , a.idnf_itm_val4 , a.idnf_itm_val5 , a.idnf_itm_val6 , a.idnf_itm_val7 , a.idnf_itm_val8 , a.idnf_itm_val9 , a.idnf_itm_val10 , a.vld_bgng_dt , a.vld_end_dt $columns$ from srvcr_idnf_itm_val_dtls a left join crosstab( 'select a.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn1 , a.critm_id , a.critm_val from srvcr_gen_itm_val_dtls a , srvcr_itm_dtls b where a.srvcr_id = ''$srvcrId$'' and a.srvcr_id = b.srvcr_id and a.critm_id = b.critm_id order by 1,b.srv_critm_ord '
,'select critm_id from srvcr_itm_dtls where srvcr_id=''$srvcrId$'' and idnf_itm_yn =''N'' order by srv_critm_ord'
) as b( idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn1 numeric $sql$ ) on( a.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn = b.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn1) where 1=1
and a.srvcr_id = #srvcrId# and a.del_yn ='N'
and replace(#critYmd#,'-','') between a.vld_bgng_dt and a.vld_end_dt
and a.idnf_itm_val1 = #idnfItmVal1#
and a.idnf_itm_val2 = #idnfItmVal2#
and a.idnf_itm_val3 = #idnfItmVal3#
and a.idnf_itm_val4 = #idnfItmVal4#
and a.idnf_itm_val5 = #idnfItmVal5#
and a.idnf_itm_val6 = #idnfItmVal6#
and a.idnf_itm_val7 = #idnfItmVal7#
and a.idnf_itm_val8 = #idnfItmVal8#
and a.idnf_itm_val9 = #idnfItmVal9#
and a.idnf_itm_val10 = #idnfItmVal10#
order by idnf_itm_val1,idnf_itm_val2,idnf_itm_val3,idnf_itm_val4,idnf_itm_val5,idnf_itm_val6,idnf_itm_val7,idnf_itm_val8,idnf_itm_val9,idnf_itm_val10, vld_end_dt desc

/*srvcrIdnfItmValDtls.selectSrvcrIdnfItmValDtls*/ select a.srvcr_id , a.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn , a.idnf_itm_val1 , a.idnf_itm_val2 , a.idnf_itm_val3 , a.idnf_itm_val4 , a.idnf_itm_val5 , a.idnf_itm_val6 , a.idnf_itm_val7 , a.idnf_itm_val8 , a.idnf_itm_val9 , a.idnf_itm_val10 , a.vld_bgng_dt , a.vld_end_dt from srvcr_idnf_itm_val_dtls a where del_yn ='N' and srvcr_id = #srvcrId#
and a.idnf_itm_val1 = #idnfItmVal1#
and a.idnf_itm_val2 = #idnfItmVal2#
and a.idnf_itm_val3 = #idnfItmVal3#
and a.idnf_itm_val4 = #idnfItmVal4#
and a.idnf_itm_val5 = #idnfItmVal5#
and a.idnf_itm_val6 = #idnfItmVal6#
and a.idnf_itm_val7 = #idnfItmVal7#
and a.idnf_itm_val8 = #idnfItmVal8#
and a.idnf_itm_val9 = #idnfItmVal9#
and a.idnf_itm_val10 = #idnfItmVal10#
and a.vld_end_dt = #vldEndDt#
/*srvcrIdnfItmValDtls.selectMaxIndfItmValDtlsSn*/ select coalesce(max(idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn),0) idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn from srvcr_idnf_itm_val_dtls a where srvcr_id = #srvcrId#

/* srvcrIdnfItmValDtls.selectSrvcrValDtls */ with v_idnf as ( select * from srvcr_idnf_itm_val_dtls where srvcr_id = #srvcrId# and vld_end_dt = '99991231235959'
and idnf_itm_val1 = #idnfItmVal1#
and idnf_itm_val2 = #idnfItmVal2#
and idnf_itm_val3 = #idnfItmVal3#
and idnf_itm_val4 = #idnfItmVal4#
and idnf_itm_val5 = #idnfItmVal5#
and idnf_itm_val6 = #idnfItmVal6#
and idnf_itm_val7 = #idnfItmVal7#
and idnf_itm_val8 = #idnfItmVal8#
and idnf_itm_val9 = #idnfItmVal9#
and idnf_itm_val10 = #idnfItmVal10#
) select cast(a.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn as integer) idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn , cast(b.srv_critm_ord as integer) srv_critm_ord , idnf_itm_yn , b.critm_id , case when b.critm_id = 'ST00002' then vld_end_dt when b.critm_id = 'ST00003' then vld_bgng_dt when srv_critm_ord = 1 then idnf_itm_val1 when srv_critm_ord = 2 then idnf_itm_val2 when srv_critm_ord = 3 then idnf_itm_val3 when srv_critm_ord = 4 then idnf_itm_val4 when srv_critm_ord = 5 then idnf_itm_val5 when srv_critm_ord = 6 then idnf_itm_val6 when srv_critm_ord = 7 then idnf_itm_val7 when srv_critm_ord = 8 then idnf_itm_val8 when srv_critm_ord = 9 then idnf_itm_val9 when srv_critm_ord = 10 then idnf_itm_val10 end critm_val , c.critm_nm from v_idnf a , srvcr_itm_dtls b , critm c where a.srvcr_id = b.srvcr_id and b.critm_id = c.critm_id and idnf_itm_yn = 'Y' union all select cast(a.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn as integer) idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn , cast(b.srv_critm_ord as integer) srv_critm_ord , b.idnf_itm_yn , a.critm_id , a.critm_val , d.critm_nm from srvcr_gen_itm_val_dtls a , srvcr_itm_dtls b , v_idnf c , critm d where a.srvcr_id = b.srvcr_id and a.critm_id = b.critm_id and b.critm_id = d.critm_id and a.srvcr_id = c.srvcr_id and a.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn = c.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn and b.idnf_itm_yn = 'N' order by idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn , srv_critm_ord
